term.title: migratory aptitude

item.text: The term is applied to characterize the relative tendency of a group to participate in a rearrangement. In nucleophilic rearrangements ( migration to an electron-deficient centre), the migratory aptitude of a group is loosely related to its capacity to stabilize a partial positive charge, but exceptions are known, and the position of hydrogen in the series is often unpredictable.
